title: The Secret of the Vanished Masterpiece

infobox.Title:: The Secret of the Vanished Masterpiece
infobox.Japanese title:: 消えた名画の秘密  (Kieta Meiga no Himitsu)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Chiharu Matsubara  Subaru Okiya

Minami Takayama as Edogawa Conan  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Miyoko Aso as Saeko Takato  Yuko Minaguchi as Mina Eguchi  Takehiro Koyama as Rokuro Wada  Shozo Iizuka as Keiichi Yagami  Yusuke Numata as Yasuo Shishikura  Haruhi Nanao as Kaoru Hayashi  Kozo Mito as Demolition employee A  Hidenari Ugaki as Demolition employee B  Shin Goto as Demolition employee C

sections.Situation: The Detective Boys decide to investigate a spooky château but realize a man is currently inhabiting the house and had remodeled the garden. The next day, the man living in the château, Rokuro Wada is revealed to have died. They learn from Keiichi Yagami, Wada's agent who sells his paintings, that Wada had been working on a masterpiece at the château for three months. They decide to search the château for the painting but to no avail. Afterwards they are visited by Wada's old aunt Saeko Takato and her caretaker Mina Eguchi who reveals that Wada sent them a letter telling them to visit the château tomorrow to view the masterpiece. Eguchi reveals Wada's masterpiece is going to help Takato regain her memories which she lost from an accident a year ago. Conan finds a photo revealing a château Takato owned in the past and realizes what Wada's masterpiece is.

sections.Trivia:
- This episode introduced a variation of the image for the "Next episode" preview. Instead of Conan's glass and bowtie lying on the ground, it's Kid's glass and his card instread. All future episodes that have Kid-related episode as the next one will use this picture instead of the normal one.
- The château reappears in a painting in Shodo house from The Scar that Evokes the Past, in Naoki Midorikawa's house from The Mansion of Death and the Red Wall, in Hiroshima hotel from The Seven Wonders of the Hiroshima Miyajima Tour, and in Misuzu Shirakawa's house from The Diamond, the Painting, and the Great Actress. Open spoiler box to see images.
